"Aye, and we lost an entire race of allies, and a few old friends as well, i 
still remember seeing HotRod after his cheange... he was truly a ray of hope 
in that dark time, and until Prime's return, he was a great leader of our 
people." Grimlock nodded and crossed his arms, "The following battle prooved we all 
were truly made of sterner stuff, and that Prime and Rodimus had balls of 
pure chrome."

--part1_131.20d34da8.2c2f9420_boundary
